ValidationRule.description: Validate when trying to be active but no 1 or more products in related list.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Fund_Template__r.cgcloud__Anchor_Type__c ,'Customer Product'), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Active'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Status__c), 'Initial'), cgcloud__Product_Count__c < 1 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To Activate the Fund at least 1 or more products need to be selected
